1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Usamah bin 'Umair Al-Hudhali said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Allah does not accept any prayer without purification and He does not accept any charity from Ghulul.'" (Sahih) Another chain with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَقْبَلُ اللَّهُ صَلاَةً بِغَيْرِ طُهُورِ
chapter.eng-name: Allah does not accept Salah (prayer) without purification
